channel.title: Minnesota AG Press Releases
channel.description: Latest press releases from the Minnesota Attorney General's Office

item.title: Attorney General Ellison urges court to uphold key provision of Voting Rights Act
Jorden Borders guilty on all counts in child torture and Medicaid Fraud case
item.description:
Publication Date: June 04, 2025

Crosslake woman physically, mentally, and emotionally abused her three children for years; defrauded Medicaid by receiving payment for PCA services based on false medical information she provided to public health nurses

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/04_Borders.asp

item.title: Attorney General secures two convictions for third-degree murder in fentanyl overdose death
item.description:
Publication Date: June 04, 2025

Breeann Lenore Krueger sentenced to 117 months in prison following death of Justin Troy Rops; Miranda Michelle Sanow to be sentenced on July 8, 2025

https://www.ag.state.mn.us/Office/Communications/2025/06/04_Fentanyl.asp
